Following the thematic approach, a total of four themes emerged. All themes summarized information about the vulnerabilities of Pakistan's public health and healthcare systems. Our assessment showed that the country is not in a position to provide required standards of care due to many intertwined reasons. These include, community and healthcare workforce related demurrals, organizational and regulatory voids and travel patterns.
